snippets: Clippers star James Harden passed Shaquille O'Neal for ninth place on the NBA's all-time scoring list.

The Los Angeles Clippers guard made a three-pointer early in the third quarter on Monday night against the Charlotte Hornets, pushing his career total to 28,598 points in his 1,187th regular-season game. O’Neal had 28,596 points in 1,207 games over 19 years.
Harden, who began the night 14 points behind O’Neal, finished with 32 points in the Clippers’ 117-109 win against the Hornets.

summary: Trump stated he is considering excluding Exxon from operations in Venezuela after the company's CEO referred to Venezuela as 'uninvestable.' No final decision has been announced.
